body.name: RGB Smart LED Floor Lamps for Living Room, Compatible with Alexa, Google Home, 69" Tall Modern Standing Lamp for Bedroom with Remote & WiFi APP Control, 2700k-6500k Corner Lamp with Linen Lampshade
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 40 mins
features: ✨【Modern & Stylish】Timeless classic cylindrical design makes it an excellent choice as art piece to improve the look of your home décor. The Tacopet floor standing lamps also upscale the ambiance of any room or corner with the soft glow of its smart light bulb.

🌈【Dynamic Dream Color】Enjoy multi-color displays as customized from millions of colors, visually stimulating modes and 2700k-6500k warm/cool whites. This RGBW corner lamp offers a multitude of options for different requirements, brings mood enhancing, mesmerizing ambiance for hosting get-togethers, watching movies or reading.

📱【Effortless Smart Control】Manage your modern floor lamp conveniently with the hands-free voice control via Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. Adjust brightness, colors and modes to DIY your desired lighting effect easily with just one tap on the remote or phone app without leaving the sofa and warm bed.

💡【Multi-Function Design】Featuring an internal (built-in) microphone, this lamp is designed to listen and respond to any music or background sound, creating a light show in total sync to the rhythm and beat of your music. The timing function allows you to turn them on and off automatically at a scheduled time. Perfect lamp for parties, gaming, entertaining guests, or just relaxing.

🛡️【Sturdy and Easy to install】Made of high quality ABS and PP material for enhanced stability and durability, a weighted base makes this floor lamp safe from children. Great heat dissipation and light divergence performance. Easy to assemble and install. Anything goes wrong with your corner lamp, please contact us to get the best solution.
body.description: Tacopet RGBWW Smart Floor Lamp Brings cozy atmosphere to your living room, bedroom, game room or office. Features aesthetically pleasing, universally appealing, and modern design. The Tacopet corner floor lamps is best to provide soft ambience when watching TV, playing games, or having a chat. Fit perfectly into any spaces and work brilliantly with any contemporary decor. RGB+White Light Mode: 16 million colors and more than 20 lighting effects for you choosing. Warm and cool white for daily lighting requirements, suitable for the dark boring corners of bedroom. Music Sync: With built-in high-sensitive microphone, smart led lamp can dance to the beat of music, hand claps, and even human voice. Three Control Ways: Convenient to control with phone APP, Smart remote, and Hands-Free Voice control like Alexa and Google Home. Natural Linen Lampshade: Made of natural linen material and premium PVC, the lampshade is water-proof, oil-proof, easy to clean, durable and non-deformation

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We recently remodeled our living room and purchased this lamp to use in a unlit corner. We love that it works with our Alexa. It is stream line. The lamp is wonderful as an accent light and a night light. Our Grandkids love that it changes colors. The base is very sturdy. It was easy to assemble. Looks very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this light. Very easy to set up. Love all the features from the color changing, bright to dim, remote control and it's very sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like this lamp, however issue with finding a replacement bulb
reviews.reviewText: The lamps present well, are good in some areas of the home, for example I have two in my bedroom. These lamps integrate well with Alexa app, and are easy to set up. I've had experiences with smart bulbs and smart plugs on a mass scale, these are easier to set up than most smart bulb technologies. Although most need to go thru a wifi connection, the mobile app in each case used to set up the bulb is a mixed bag. Some for example need wifi 2.4 ghz vs. 5.0, some apps forced a software upgrade which prolonged the process. In one case, my xFinity wireless hub needed to be replaced, and I lost many connections throughout the house, and had to reengage with the Alexa app which was extremely painful. Pay attention to "Alexa Certified" or "Alexa Ready", etc., when making purchases with smart technology.One issue I have with the lamps, I wanted to find some replacement bulbs to have on hand. The light comes with 1 bulb which is OK, but I could not find any indication or labeling to denote the manufacturer to order just the bulbs. I wanted to make sure I had the same smart tech experience so trying to match the bulb type. There are several options from the controller, such as 1:Many or Many:1 if you want to use a single remote controller to control multiple lamps for example. I called Amazon support and got no where with this question. There was no definitive identification on the packaging of the bulb. Hope this review is helpful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Y’all need this lamp!
reviews.reviewText: As a migraine sufferer who struggles to find the perfect lighting that does not hurt my eyes and increases the severity of my migraines, Henry’s cool feature on the lamp, allows me to be productive with work, while still managing my migraines. The colorful hues to choose from are fun and elegant, depending on if it’s date night or movie night! I’m very glad we added “Henry” (my daughter named it) into our lives! Definitely recommend, a 10/10!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does work as promised.
reviews.reviewText: Bought 2 of these. Response to sound doesn't work on either lamp. More China made crap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is great! Perfect for corners of rooms behind furniture with not much space. The light can be dimmed and has many colors. My son loves playing with the remote and changing the color of the light. We ended up buying a second one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not very bright, but functional in a basement or kids room not for large living space

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Google voice control
reviews.reviewText: Loving these lamps, bought them as we had a newborn and was tired of sleeping with a light on bright. Now able to use them in red light, dim them, and control them by asking them to turn on via my Google hub. It’s the best!

I bought one of these almost a year ago, it’s been great, love the minimal elegance. I replaced the bulb with a Hue lightbulb and that works fine too. We wanted to get another for a different room and I got a different brand/version by mistake - the lamp shade and pole are not nearly the same quality. I wish I had got this one instead.
